body.title: Castor
body.p: Castor is a versatile B2B connector (marketing pitch) which integrates Java[tm] objects, XML documents, SQL relational databases and LDAP directories in a unified model that allows information to be exchanged, persisted and manipulated in a variety of ways. The Castor moto is simplifying the exchange and persistence of information.
The current release of Castor includes the following packages:

ul.li: Castor XML: Java[tm] object to XML document mapping
Castor JDO: Java[tm] object to SQL relational database mapping
Castor DSML: LDAP directory exchange through XML

body.p: Most of the code released through the Castor Project has been developed by Keith Visco, Chief XML Architect, Exoffice Technologies, Inc. <visco@exoffice.com> and Assaf Arkin, CTO <arkin@exoffice.com>. Contributors are welcome to join this project and should contact join@castor.exolab.org.
